name: ISO2Mesh
tagline: ISO2Mesh - a 3D surface and volumetric mesh generator for MATLAB/Octave
body:
### About ISO2Mesh
```ISO2Mesh``` is a free matlab/octave-based mesh generation and processing toolbox. It can create 3D tetrahedral finite element (FE) mesh from surfaces, 3D binary and gray-scale volumetric images such as segmented MRI/CT scans.

```ISO2Mesh``` is an open-source software developed by [Qianqian Fang](http://www.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/~fangq) at the [Optics Division](http://nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/PMI/), [Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging](http://nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/), [Massachusetts General Hospital/Harvard Medical School](http://www.massgeneral.org/).

Details of this software can be found in the following paper
* Qianqian Fang and David Boas, "[Tetrahedral mesh generation from volumetric binary and gray-scale images](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/upload/ISBI2009_abstract_final_web.pdf)," Proceedings of IEEE International Symposium on Biomedical Imaging 2009, pp. 1142-1145, 2009

### Download

* [Download & register](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Download)
* [Full changelog](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Doc/ChangeLog)
* [All release notes](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Doc/ReleaseNotes)

### Getting started

* [Online documentation](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Doc)
* [Basic example](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Doc/Basics)
* [README file](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Doc/README)

### Tutorials

* [How to create a mesh from a gray-scale image volume](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Doc/Mesh_GrayscaleImage)
* [How to create a spherical mesh with refined mesh densities](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Doc/AdaptiveMesh)
* [Creating a complex brain atlas FEM mesh using iso2mesh utilities](http://mcx.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?action=browse&id=MMC/Colin27AtlasMesh/Version2&oldid=MMC/CollinsAtlasMesh/Version2)

### Get help

* [iso2mesh-users mailing list](https://groups.google.com/forum/?hl=en#!forum/iso2mesh-users)

### Contribute to ISO2Mesh

* [How to contribute](http://iso2mesh.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/index.cgi?Devel)
* [Report bugs](https://github.com/fangq/iso2mesh/issues)
* [Github page](https://github.com/fangq/iso2mesh)
